about: Graphic design helps people to identify the value of the corporation or company. As Thomas J. Watson said "Good design is good business", design plays important role in business. Nowadays, no company that does not require visual identity because it helps people distinct one company with another. As a logo designer, I help people and company to represent their image and value through high taste, good looking, and good quality logo or visual identity.

about:
Thanks for stopping by to my design portfolio. I am a designer, specifically the logo design with a unique design, intelligent visual images to present business and client needs. I try to make designs that work well in all colors and media (web and print needs).
  Of course I also provide services for business card design, email signatures, banners etc.

about:

about:
We are graphic designers Milica & Krsto with different styles and distinctive approaches to design, but that doesn't stop us from working together and mixing it up so we can better respond to client needs. Our love is with the vintage black & white design but we love spicing it up with some colors and a lot of details. Our main interests are logo, illustration, and label. Feel free to contact us.

about:
Nice to meet you, I am a constantly growing graphic designer and illustrator. I like to do my work on time and communicate with the client so that the end of the project is more precise.
  I have full experience with Adobe Illustrator, with Photoshop I am still in practice with many more such as Indesgin, Premier and After Effects.
  I seek to employ myself in the creation of logos, flyers, banners, designs for flannels and illustrations

about:
Art studies in Berlin, free-lance as art director, designer and copytexter since 2001. Love simplicity and everything that is smart and witty (at the same time).
  /
  Ich habe Kunst studiert an der UdK in Berlin und arbeite seit 2001 als freiberufliche Art Direktorin und Grafikerin. Mein Herz schlägt für Design, das bodenständig, besonders, präzise und durchdacht ist. Und ich mag alles, was klug und lustig (zugleich) ist.
  /

about: I graduated from college with a Degree in Fine Arts Major in Advertising in the year 2007. After that I started my journey as a graphic artist in a graphic design firm from 2007 to 2010. Then, I decided to be self-employed from year 2011 to present as a freelance graphic artist. I'll be glad working with my clients to share the best of my expertise and service.

about:
We are a small studio with more than 10 years of experience in the field of design. For us graphic design goes beyond creating a drawing, image, logo or illustration.
  For us it is the ability to bring our clients ideas to life and traslate them into projects. Like a studio we have given life to designs around the world, creating websites, social media packages, logo and corporate image design, packaging, commercial logos , business cards. (etc)

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about:

about: I'm Shojol, allowing me to put thoughtful design first, every time. My clients, are more than just that — they are partners. I collaborate with like-minded folks, on projects I'm inspired by. The most fruitful relationships are those where I walk away from the process having learned something new.

about: I have a decade of experience in design and design thinking. Over these years, I've worked on a number of Indian and international engagements including for Goldman Sachs, GE Digital, 3M India, TE Connectivity, ITC Foods, Hyatt Hotels & Portea Medical. I've a keen interest in product design. I am the Co-Founder of Mrdaa, a potteryware enterprise based out of Bangalore. I won the Best website in South India award hosted by AFAQs. I was nominated in the Print AD category hosted by Kyoorius Awards.

about: I am an illustrator. I studied graphics, painting, composition, color science for 6 years at the Kostandi Art School and 6 years at the Odessa State Academy of Civil Engineering and Architecture as an architect. I work mainly in Adobe Illustrator.I worked in an architecture firm for 2 years, but now I am focusing on illustration. Currently I am focused on creating book illustrations, covers, characters,stickers, postcards.I am open to new experiences, acquaintances, projects.

about: A one-stop-shop for all your creative needs! I'm a graphics designer and also a photographer and videographer. I am very passionate about my work and I see myself as a very creative person. Whatever your needs, I can provide it with my expertise. If you need a powerful logo to compete with others or a video to promote your product, I am the right person for you! With several years of freelance experience, I dabbled in many fields and honed my skills.

about:
A professional designer with extensive experience and knowledge of printing technologies.
  Logos, corporate identity, packaging, poster, illustration, painting. Specialization in packaging - decorating spirits brands. More than 300 projects in the alcoholic theme of the past in print, and contributed to the increase in sales.
  Huge experience in designing graphical design and preparation of files for printing.
